name: A Pirate Adventure (Argharna)
description:
Welcome to the adventure of your life!

Will you become the next pirate that will terrorize the seas? Or are you the one who will bring those that aim for it on their knees?

Or maybe your role in history is not so important.

---------------------------------------------------------

 Click at the choices you want to make.

Press Esc to get the menu to return to main menu or change music volume.

---------------------------------------------------------

This is my first attempt at creating a simple game.

Please enjoy and let me know your feedback!
